entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 1:11PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Another Round of Snow This Afternoon through Sunday... Snow will continue developing over the Southern Interior through this evening, spreading north into the White Mountains tonight. entry.title: Flood Watch issued October 07 at 2:55PM EDT until October 08 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: .A low pressure system with deep moisture will bring a period of moderate to locally heavy rain to the region through tonight. Some localized flooding of urban, low lying, and poor drainage areas will be possible where the heaviest rainfall occurs. Isolated flash flooding is also possible should heavy rainfall rates occur. Fall leaf debris could exacerbate flooding issues if blocking storm

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Frost Late Tonight And Early Sunday Morning... Patchy frost will develop late tonight, especially in sheltered valleys, as low temperatures drop into the mid and upper 30s.
